website_summaries.verdict: The iFrogz Summit Wireless may not be a steal at its modest price point, but it's still a good value in wireless sports headphones.
pros: The iFrogz Summit Wireless is lightweight, comfortable in-ear Bluetooth sports headphone that's sweat resistant and delivers decent sound for its modest price point
It has a nifty magnetic clip system on the inline remote and has 10 hours of battery at moderate volumes
Included wings help create a secure fit
cons: Looks a little cheap up close
unclear how well the headphones will hold up over time

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and dont even work!
customer_reviews.text: If I could I'd leave no stars! Was really looking forward to these but was very disappointed product arrived today only to find not only were they not even half way charged the sync button broken I cant even press the button to attempt to sync it with my device! But that's not the end of it even the charging port is broken and won't even try to accept the charging Cable what a literal load of crap and I demand a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Ingram

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are a great price for bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a great price for bluetooth, but you get what you pay for. The sound quality is crystal clear sometimes, but the bluetooth seems to struggle keeping a good connection. Most of the time the sound quality sounds like you've been put on hold after calling some cheap customer service phone line (scratchy and low quality). I've seen this same problem pairing to both my Macbook and my phone. I do like the magnetic clip though. It can be used to store the headphones without them getting tangled in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: battery life
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset because it said it lasted for 10 hours for battery time, but it only lasted for maybe 5 hours. Was really sad about that. Hoping that after I've used it and drained it twice that it will charge and then last for the 10 hours . Love the fit and the sound quality is good have only used it for a few days hope that both last for quite a while
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked them, but reliability is trash.
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were comfortable, and they are definitely affordable. The problem, however, is after a month one pair refused to stay connected to bluetooth of even tun on properly. Warrentied them, thought "OK, well give it another go." The second pair I have given up on. Battery life is supposed to be 10 hours. I used them for maybe an hour and a half one day, Turned them off, then tried to use them the next morning. Dead. Happened a couple times in a row. And that's that.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hornick

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price, decent design
customer_reviews.text: They are functional and fit my ears. I must have extremely narrow ear canal openings, as I struggle with most earbuds of this style. Charges well, works very welll for barbell weight lifting since you don't have a drapey cord hanging down the back of your neck. Sound quality is about what you'd expect at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: editx

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with iPhone 7!
customer_reviews.text: When I searched the internet for wireless headsets compatible with iPhone 7, this item was recommended as one with a fair price. The price was fair, but the headsets WILL NOT pair with the iPhone 7. Suggestion to sellers for this type product : CLEARLY state in the item specs what it is compatible to. This will save people like me from ordering a product that is, in all essence, useless!
customer_reviews.author: J. Strawther

customer_reviews.title: it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: i used it nearly for a year, i was so pleased. sound quality was so good, battery was staying for 5-6 hours. then i haven't used it for a while, i wanted to use it, but there was no light on it. i tryed many different sources but it did not work. it doesnt recharge and there is no light on it. i dont know what to with it.
customer_reviews.author: Murat

customer_reviews.title: Great design, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros - great design, love the magnet idea and comfortable in my ears Cons - short bluetooth range (about 2 ft), short batter life Big Con - Second pair to simply die (1 pair from Amazon, 1 from BBuy) within weeks of purchase. Both times, I was listening and they went off (assumed end of batter life). However, I could not get them to charge, power up. No lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your money! The earbud didn't work at all. have tried to return it---will post if they allow this or not. in the meantime, DON'T BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: CARLA

customer_reviews.title: I like these, but design flawed
customer_reviews.text: I like these, but design flawed. If you want to wear the wire behind your head/neck, the controller is then ALSO behind your head/neck.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Oneal

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, stays in ears throughout working out/running
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, stays in ears throughout working out/running, good sound quality. Short battery life between charges 2-3 days, low battery warning only about 10 seconds before turning off, light when charging stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the price. Good bass and clear sound but not a lot of treble. When the battery start going down the bluethooth signal gets weaker.
customer_reviews.author: Thonyy88

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Return Customer
customer_reviews.text: Got my original pair, loved them and boasted them to everyone I know. Got a second pair after unavoidable wear and tear, second pair I got new is worse than the original pair after being beat up intensely. Disappointed to no extent.
customer_reviews.author: Klasique Clutch

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Only Spent $30
customer_reviews.text: What the hell? I wore these about a dozen times and now they won't take a charge. They're dead! Glad I only spent $30 on them. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price! Inexpensive, light, sounds decent, and calls come in perfectly. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality Lost connection when I put iPod in my back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Handylady

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, stays in you ears at the gym
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, stays in you ears at the gym, however the battery died after using them for only a hour.
customer_reviews.author: Chirs

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I mean, WOW... I bought a pair of Dr. Dre's beats, and those are great... BUT YOU JUST CAN'T BEAT THE PRICE of these headphones! Sound quality (for an inexpensive wireless set), AMAZING! Bluetooth ability to bounce from laptop to phone - AMAZING! To use during working out - AMAZING! With wireless headphones that wrap around the back of your neck... If your on a bench or on your back for whatever reason, they slip off... WHile running, they tend to shift to one side and that's just annoying... These are PERFECT for working out and you don't have to worry if someone steals them due to their inexpensive value! One of the best purchases ever!
customer_reviews.author: Cris Fabian

customer_reviews.title: When going down the highway I could hear the music but not really anything like a talk show
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use on my motorcycle. They worked okay. When going down the highway I could hear the music but not really anything like a talk show. Even turned all the way up. Eventually, they stopped pairing with my Verizon droid. I had to reboot it several times which got to the point of frustration that I don't use them anymore. This was my first wireless earbud purchase so I'll check it some others. If your a motorcycle rider, I would not recommend using these for that.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart T. Serine

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for about a month. The search continues for a good exercise-proof Bluetooth earbud.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: great product.. recieved wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Great product one problem though. I received the red ones. when I was supposed to receive the black ones. other than that I love them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Does not connect to bluetooth at all. I have tried multiple devices and none of them can find or detect the signal from the headphones. The bluetooth capability does not exist.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a couple of hours of use at best. I have an LG pair that last for ...
customer_reviews.text: Found out they can only be paired with ONE device... Forever. And if you try to "un-pair" the device you cannot pair it with anything (including the original device) ever again. I've been through two sets and they both work this way. Also the battery life is awful. Maybe a couple of hours of use at best. I have an LG pair that last for days. I would never recommend these earbuds to anyone. On the positive side, they do sound good, and I like the volume control range. My LG is still super loud on the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Bosch

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are cheaply made. Sound cuts out far easier than more expensive versions. I never had that issue with Jaybirds. These fit well in your ear and sound is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn G. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: For the first couple of weeks these were awesome. Sound quality was great but even the lowest ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a cheaper replacement after I lost my Beats. For the first couple of weeks these were awesome. Sound quality was great but even the lowest volume is very loud. Biggest issue is the buds and ear pieces frequently fell off. Magnet didn't keep headphone on collar but did manage to get "stuck" to things and rip the headphones ripped off of my head. Less than a month in the right ear bud stopped working. I was quickly sent a replacement. Sadly it turned out that the replacement was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far, not the best sound ever but not too bad for the proce
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble connecting it to my phone at first but only because I wasn't pressing and holding the button long enough like the instructions. The sound is alright. Not the best mind you - at least when it's up to the highest volume but pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: PKC

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great value. Decent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well and great value. Decent sound quality. Stays in ear on run well since all the weight is clipped to your shirt instead of bouncing from your ear
customer_reviews.author: Nick K

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Not like the picture and a different brand arrived. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DRL

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it fir this price
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are pretty amazing. They sound better than some other Bluetooth headphones I've used, and at half the price. They can get uncomfortable after extended use (over a couple hours) but great for an hour long workout.
customer_reviews.author: d.stephan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I'm now thinking of getting a second pair to leave at the firehouse just for workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Z

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth sensor doesn't work after one month. Never dropped or kept in sun. Well taken care. Useless after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ajith K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! Very good sound quality! The battery lasts for about 8 hours of continuous music play! They are very comfortable and the included different sized earbuds and ear wings are amazing! I was able to change both out and it fit my ear like a glove. The magnetic piece that allows you to clip it to your shirt is great as well. It makes taking it off and putting it on so easy! If you are looking for a good set of Bluetooth headsets that are comfy but not bulky these are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make it 90days.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible....didn't last 3 months ..#dead. Sweat for a sport headphones must be too much.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cuz they were the cheapest at airport. Sound was good with an extra set of comply tips i had. I really like the design over the other BT sets i have had. I have been able to put the mic in the front of my motorcycle helmet and chat at 75mph. Battery life could be better at about 3 hours of constant loud music, but they charge quickly. Used alot for the last 3 months and stull sound great, and have had very little loss of signal.
customer_reviews.author: PDRhound

customer_reviews.title: Going Foam tips helped
customer_reviews.text: It is what you’d get at this price point. Battery life is about 4-5 hours absolute max. Average but perfect for a set of earphones that you wouldn’t feel bas about losing. However, I had an extra comply foam pair that I put on it. And the sound improved quite a bit with the better seal. And comfort as well— for me and others who prefer the foam tips. Very light as well. Ill often forget I got it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Isip

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ IF YOU HAVE AN IPHONE
customer_reviews.text: No stars for this product. I bought a pair at an airport (new) they would not pair with my iPhone7. Tried to pair them with my children’s iPhones 6s and 5c, all of which that are up to date with software. These earbuds are NOT compatible. Zagg customer service was useless.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about a month, then sound started cutting out. Sometimes for 4 or 5 seconds. Don't waste your money unless you want something that you don't care if you loose or destroy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is simply works for me
customer_reviews.text: I just like it, battery life is great, the way it design to be wrapped, the way it holds on my shirt, it is simply works for me.
customer_reviews.author: saoud alsulaiti

customer_reviews.title: Great product nice price
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is amazing. I put them on and hear everything perfectly and no one really hear my music. Pretty amazing for it to be bluetooth at this price
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Douma

product_meta.title: iFrogz IFSUME-BK0 Summit Wireless Earphone - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:blackFind your stride with the Summit Wireless Earbuds. Their lightweight, wireless design helps you power through any day — or workout — with premium sound to spare. Ergonomically designed secure-fit wings nestle in the curve of your ears to hold the earbuds in place while booming 8mm drivers keep you going when the going gets tough.

BOX CONTAINS
IFrogz IFSUME-BK0 Summit Wireless Earbuds - Black
feature_bullets: A soft securing wing nestles in the curve of your ears to keep your earbuds in place no matter the activity.
The wireless hub clips to your shirt collar so that convenient music and call controls are easily within reach.
The wireless Bluetooth design seamlessly connects to your device and eliminates cables so you can move freely.
8mm drivers deliver crisp, clear sound that will keep you going for up to six hours per charge.
The wireless hub clip easily secures the earbuds when not in use.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
